ai-thag16.5:1.1_0: When you see a sight, mindfulness is lost
ai-thag16.5:1.2_0: as attention latches on a pleasant feature.
ai-thag16.5:1.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind full of desire,
ai-thag16.5:2.6_0: you’re said to be far from extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:3.1_0: Having heard a sound and forgotten mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:3.2_0: as attention latches on a pleasant feature.
ai-thag16.5:3.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind full of desire,
ai-thag16.5:4.6_0: you’re said to be far from extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:5.1_0: When you smell an odor, mindfulness is lost
ai-thag16.5:5.2_0: as attention latches on a pleasant feature.
ai-thag16.5:5.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind full of desire,
ai-thag16.5:6.6_0: you’re said to be far from extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:7.1_0: Having savoured a taste and forgotten mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:7.2_0: as attention latches on a pleasant feature.
ai-thag16.5:7.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind full of desire,
ai-thag16.5:8.6_0: you’re said to be far from extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:9.1_0: Having touched a tangible and forgotten mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:9.2_0: as attention latches on a pleasant feature.
ai-thag16.5:9.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind full of desire,
ai-thag16.5:10.6_0: you’re said to be far from extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:11.1_0: Having cognized a thought and forgotten mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:11.2_0: as attention latches on a pleasant feature.
ai-thag16.5:11.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind full of desire,
ai-thag16.5:12.6_0: you’re said to be far from extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:13.1_0: When you see a sight with mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:13.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind free of desire,
ai-thag16.5:13.4_0: do not try to get rid of it.
ai-thag16.5:14.1_0: Even as you see a sight
ai-thag16.5:14.2_0: and get familiar with how it feels,
ai-thag16.5:14.6_0: you’re said to be in the presence of extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:15.1_0: When you hear a sound with mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:15.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind free of desire,
ai-thag16.5:15.4_0: do not try to get rid of it.
ai-thag16.5:16.1_0: Even as you hear a sound
ai-thag16.5:16.2_0: and get familiar with how it feels,
ai-thag16.5:16.6_0: you’re said to be in the presence of extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:17.1_0: When you smell an odor with mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:17.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind free of desire,
ai-thag16.5:17.4_0: do not try to get rid of it.
ai-thag16.5:18.1_0: Even as you smell an odor
ai-thag16.5:18.2_0: and get familiar with how it feels,
ai-thag16.5:18.6_0: you’re said to be in the presence of extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:19.1_0: When you sense a taste with mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:19.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind free of desire,
ai-thag16.5:19.4_0: do not try to get rid of it.
ai-thag16.5:20.1_0: Even as you savor a taste
ai-thag16.5:20.2_0: and get familiar with how it feels,
ai-thag16.5:20.6_0: you’re said to be in the presence of extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:21.1_0: When you sense a touch with mindfulness,
ai-thag16.5:21.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind free of desire,
ai-thag16.5:21.4_0: do not try to get rid of it.
ai-thag16.5:22.1_0: Even as you sense a touch
ai-thag16.5:22.2_0: and get familiar with how it feels,
ai-thag16.5:22.6_0: you’re said to be in the presence of extinguishment.
ai-thag16.5:23.3_0: Experiencing it with a mind free of desire,
ai-thag16.5:23.4_0: do not try to get rid of it.
ai-thag16.5:24.1_0: Even as you know a thought
ai-thag16.5:24.2_0: and get familiar with how it feels,
ai-thag16.5:24.6_0: you’re said to be in the presence of extinguishment.
